data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Nunavut to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nunavut, Canada
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Nunavut, Canada to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Father, grace the churches in Nunavut, Canada with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Nunavut to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Japanese people. Make the Japanese people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, comfort those who mourn in Nunavut, Canada.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Nunavut, Canada know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Nunavut, Canada.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.
